website_summaries.verdict: Brightly colored backless booster car seat gives kids a cup holder and plenty of padding for long trips.
pros: Offers foam padding in the seat to keep the child feeling comfortable
Less restricting for larger kids than a car seat with a full back
Made to safely fit kids weighing between 40-pounds
Blue in the fabric is extremely bright and contrasts nicely with Superman logo
cons: Backless design isn't for small children
Fabric looks great, but could be more durable

customer_reviews.title: Very cute booster seats, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and a Batman one for my other child. These are really light weight and my kids only require the seat pet of the booster so installing is pretty much set it down lol. It comes with a cup holder that you can put on either side of the seat. There isn’t really much padding, but my kids have never complained that they were uncomfortable and they love them. The cover to the seats comes off and on easy for cleaning. Just run it through the wash and good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca swoboda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old niece loved this booster. Good material, doesn't look cheap. Seems like it will be easy to clean also. Not much padding on seat but most boosters don't have a lot of cushion. I would recommend this Wonder Woman booster.
customer_reviews.author: mcplan5

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, decent comfort, do not  buy for cup holder.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and the graphic was bright and we'll printed. Might have better padding but it still isn't bad. Soo why not 5 stars? the cup holder. It keeps Lippencot and is at an able that unless it is a straight bench style seat will not fit. It is a shame because that was the feature that put me over top on buying this, not just my kid's love of Wonder Woman.
customer_reviews.author: Raziel1313

customer_reviews.title: Add more padding
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Wonder Woman logo for my sweet granddaughter who is all about superheroes. So glad we now have Wonder Woman for a role model! As other reviewers have stated, the seat padding isn’t generous. It was easy to remove the cover and add more padding. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the convenience of the seat. I had it in a Jeep Wrangler before I purchased a 4Runner and I am very pleased with the back seat of the 4Runner but not at all while in the jeep. It appeared way too uncomfortable and border line dangerous in the jeep. My daughter loves it. Wish it had two cup holders. I recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Kid does not complain!
customer_reviews.text: My kid hates car seats and boosters since the beginning of the times, and she just loved this one. She never complains about it, and even says that it is comfortable (and that's a big thing for my kid who always complains about everything). I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Neria

customer_reviews.title: Delivered to us stained
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute seat but ours came in with stains which was really dissapointing. I always read reviews and this one had a lot of great ones but when ours came in we took it out the box and we saw stains on it. We will have to wash it and hope they come out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have a wider base than the Graco boosters but is hard so probably not comfortable for long drives
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this booster. Seems to have a wider base than the Graco boosters but is hard so probably not comfortable for long drives. Initially had issues with the cupholder staying connected but once we moved the seat fabric out of the way, it connected (and stayed) just fine.
customer_reviews.author: MARY ANN

customer_reviews.title: For every young super hero
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected and super cute. My little girl always wants to ride in her big girl seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My kid was thrilled to see and use her big kid booster seat. She did complain of discomfort on long drives though. It’s not very cushioned but I also think she’s just not used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Time for booster seats
customer_reviews.text: The boys love them! They are so convenient and easy to use and maneuver. They were happy to get out of the car seats and the fact that I could get both Batman and Superman topped the list.
customer_reviews.author: tenminus9

customer_reviews.title: No more latch system attachment
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one a year ago or so, and it came with an attachment to latch onto the car's latch system. Lost the seat and wanted a new one... this one doesn't have it. What's with sliding around booster seats?? So not helpful. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: thatbook

customer_reviews.title: A bit wider than current car seat
customer_reviews.text: We are currently using this as an extra car seat. It’s bigger than the booster seat that we currently have. My granddaughter loves it, she says it’s comfortable and loves Wonder Woman.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old wanted a new chair that wasn't so baby like so we purchased this chair. She loves it! It is super cute and is good quality. It doesn't seem as good of quality as the other Graco chair we replaced, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: MommyofTWO1116

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great booster. Lightweight but seems durable. With the cup holder was better and permanently attached, but it does the job. Great seat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lilasskicker

customer_reviews.title: Cute seat, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I wish the seat had better cushioning. Easy to install, easy to clean, cup holder that is also easily removed for cleaning. Daughter loves the Supergirl design
customer_reviews.author: cem

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. Before purchasing, I hadn't noticed that there's only 1 cup holder. Other seats for the same price have 2 retractable cup/snack holders.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to lend to friends who don't have car seats. Very easy to move and works great in a pinch for short trips. Would not use for long road trips or highway driving.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this booster seat! It's easy to clean and take in and out of my vehicles!
customer_reviews.author: jody Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this design. Gives her a choice in her style and she says it’s very comfortable. Much taller than some of the others we have had, which she likes because she can see well.
customer_reviews.author: Ctinas

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman booster seat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice booster seat. Feels very sturdy. The wonder woman print is nice. But the padding for the back side is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: price is right kid was happy
customer_reviews.text: I used it when my friend came over with his family. It was perfect because they stayed only a week and did not need all the bells and whistles yet the kid appreciated the Wonder woman logo, she knew what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine H

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: As pictured is what we received. The seems to be larger then another department stores booster seat. My four-year-old was so excited.

customer_reviews.title: Rollover accident
customer_reviews.text: We were involved in a rollover accident. This booster seat which I thought might be too big-was perfect! Both of our grandchildren were safe and the seat protected them. Buying again.

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Not hard or soft. Easy for my daughter to carry and use. Seat belt adjuster is easy for her to use.

customer_reviews.title: Great.

customer_reviews.title: Girl power
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this car seat. I like that the cover goes all the way around the seat like a slip cover. The other seats I had was a elastic loop and the cover use to always come off.

customer_reviews.title: The cover seems to be good, but I just started using it

customer_reviews.title: It’s a really good and well made booster seat
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good and well made booster seat. My only issue is there is not quite enough cushion to it . We travel a lot and I’ll have to get a foam piece to put in it. Other than that it’s really a great booster.

product_meta.title: KidsEmbrace Backless Booster Car Seat, DC Comics Superman
product_meta.description: Style:SupermanWhether you’re driving your kids to school, running errands around town or on long road trips, you will have peace of mind knowing that they’re safe and secure in our KidsEmbrace Superman Backless Booster Seat. Our backless booster car seats are certified “BEST BET BOOSTER” from the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety and exceeds the Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards (FMVSS 213). The KidsEmbrace backless booster seat is designed for children a minimum of 4 years old, weighing 40-100lbs and 40"-57" in height. Featuring a shoulder belt positioning clip so you can use your car’s seat belt across their shoulder and lap to safely secure your child. The contoured booster seat cushion is made with extra polyurethane foam padding for added comfort, and removable cover is machine washable. Cupholder can hold a drink, snacks or tiny treasures.
feature_bullets: AGE AND SIZE RECOMMENDATIONS: The Superman backless booster seat is designed for children a minimum of 4 years old, weighing 40-100lbs and 40"-57" in height
ADDED COMFORT: The contoured booster seat cushion is made with extra polyurethane foam padding so your child will enjoy every moment of their ride while flying around the city of Metropolis
BELT POSITIONING CLIP: Our Superman no-back booster seat has a shoulder belt positioning clip so you can easily adjust the seat belt according to your child's size.

CERTIFIED SAFE: Drive safe knowing your Superman booster car seat is a certified “BEST BET BOOSTER” from the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety and exceeds the Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards (FMVSS 213).
CUP HOLDER: Equipped with a cup holder so your child can enjoy their beverage or snack at any time during the ride.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars379 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
